title: Assassination of Iranian nuclear scientists
summary: Between 2010 and 2012, four Iranian nuclear scientists (Masoud Alimohammadi, Majid Shahriari, Darioush Rezaeinejad and Mostafa Ahmadi Roshan) were assassinated, while another (Fereydoon Abbasi) was wounded in an attempted murder.[1][2] In November 2020 another scientist (Mohsen Fakhrizadeh) was assassinated.
